definition: vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

pinyin: ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 ren4 wu5
ci2 hui4 pan4 duan4 zuo4 ye4

sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.
sentences.chinese: 一套公共詞彙或共識可以全方位幫助溝通。

sentences.english: A Roget's Thesaurus will do the trick, as will any number of vocabulary building books.
sentences.chinese: 一本羅熱辭典或者其它詞彙書就可以幫你做到這一點。

sentences.english: This passage is to discuss the lexical characteristics of Business English.
sentences.chinese: 筆者將從詞彙角度，略談一下商務英語的用詞特點。

sentences.english: The occupation of genetic engineer took a few more years to be named, this time by Poul Anderson.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後這個詞彙才被保羅安德森應用於科學當中。

sentences.english: Use vocabulary learning methods to focus quickly on the vocabulary YOU need to study.
sentences.chinese: 用詞彙學習方法來集中學習你需要掌握的詞彙表。

sentences.english: Use vocabulary learning methods to focus quickly on the vocabulary YOU need to study.
sentences.chinese: 用詞彙學習方法來集中學習你需要掌握的詞彙表。

sentences.english: This will improve your phrase-slinging ability.
sentences.chinese: 這可以幫助你提高靈活運用詞彙的能力。

sentences.english: How is the difficulty level for each word determined?
sentences.chinese: 每個詞彙是如何歸入不同的難度等級的？

sentences.english: By contrast, almost every Indian has a basic English vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 反而，幾乎每個印度人都瞭解基本的英語詞彙。

sentences.english: Racoon , what's a better tv show to practice Chinese? The vocabulary must be very easy.
sentences.chinese: 哪是好電視展示實踐？詞彙量必須容易。

sentences.english: The insufficient vocabulary is one ofthemain blockages for Chinese students to make the improvement in English.
sentences.chinese: 詞彙量不足是影響學生英語水平提高的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: You can look up this word in the vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 你在詞彙表裏查這個詞。

sentences.english: The study of modern lexicology has made great breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 現代詞彙學已經獲得了較大的突破。

sentences.english: In the study of modern Chinese, lexicology is a comparatively under-researched field.
sentences.chinese: 在現代漢語研究中，詞彙領域的研究相對比較薄弱。

sentences.english: Automatic extraction of Chinese basic vocabulary is the learning process.
sentences.chinese: 漢語基本詞彙提取是自學習的過程。

sentences.english: There's a word I keep hearing lately: “technocrat.
sentences.chinese: 最近我一直能夠聽到一個詞彙，那就是“技術官僚”。

definition: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
